docs.title: Counter Applications in Go
docs.text: This project has counter applications written in Go. This project includes the visitor counter and the key counter web application. Key counter web app uses POST method to send data to server and retrives using response data.

docs.title: Key Counter in Go Web Server
docs.text: This app is a key counter that counts the number of keys pressed using the HTTP POST request to send data to the web server. It counts the number with square number and triangular number, square number is number times number and triangular number is number times (number plus one) divided by two.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/lulunac27a/counter-app-go
cd key-counter
go run key-counter.go

Open localhost:8080 in your browser.

docs.title: Key Counter Command Line Application in Go
docs.text: This app is a key counter using command line in Go. Currently, it only supports UNIX (macOS and Linux).

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/lulunac27a/counter-app-go
cd key-counter-cli
go run key-counter-cli-unix.go

docs.title: Visitor Counter in Go Web Server
docs.text: This app is a visitor counter that counts the number of visitor views since the server is started.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/lulunac27a/counter-app-go
cd visitor-counter
go run visitor-counter.go

Open localhost:8080 in your browser.
